kv19.8:3.1: Atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṁ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.3: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṁ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.5: atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṁ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:3.7: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṁ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:4.1: Atthi lokiyaṁ somanassaṁ, atthi lokiyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ …pe…
kv19.8:4.2: atthi lokiyaṁ jīvitaṁ, atthi lokiyaṁ jīvitindriyanti?

kv19.8:9.4: “addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svākāre, suviññāpaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino viharante”ti.
kv19.8:10.1: Atīte kilese jahati anāgate kilese jahati paccuppanne kilese jahati,
